Honey never spoils; archaeologists have found pots of it in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3000 years old!
Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't.
Sharks existed before trees on Earth.
Your body contains about 37.2 trillion cells.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped to prevent it from rolling away.
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance.'
There are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on Earth.
An astronaut's height increases in space because of the lack of gravity compressing their spine.
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins.
